run

@Deprecated
public void run(boolean gui)
Deprecated. used internally

Registered at the dreisoft.tresos.launcher2.plugin.startup extension point to activate this plug-in as soon as possible. Early activation is required for the correct enabled state of registered command handlers.

Specified by:
run in interface dreisoft.tresos.launcher2.startup.IStartup
